general.name: mangaRSS
general.short: Row-stacked, flux-calibrated fiber spectra for a given galaxy across all exposures.
general.description: The MaNGA DRP provides summary row-stacked spectra (RSS; with both logarithmic and linear wavelength solutions) for each galaxy that combine individual fiber spectra of that galaxy across multiple exposures into a single row-stacked format. The RSS files are a two-dimensional array with horizontal size N_spec and vertical size N = \sum N_fiber(i) where N_fiber(i) is the number of fibers in the IFU targeting this galaxy for the i'th exposure and the sum runs over all exposures.

surveys.name: MaNGA
surveys.long: Mapping Nearby Galaxies at Apache Point Observatory
surveys.description: A wide-field optical spectroscopic IFU survey of extragalactic sources to study galaxy dynamics and kinematics

general.naming_convention: manga-[plate]-[ifudesign]-[type]RSS.fits.gz, where [plate] is the plate number, [ifudesign] is the design IFU size and number, and [type] is either LOG or LIN indicating whether the file uses a logarithmic or linear based wavelength solution. The combined [plate]-[ifudesign] is also known as the 'plate-ifu' designation of a given galaxy.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

Bits in sdssMaskbits.par used by mask extension
Survey leading this observation and its mode

hdu1.description: Row-stacked spectra from all exposures for the target in units of 10(-17) erg/s/cm2/Ang/fiber [NWAVE x (NFIBER*NEXP)]

OMEGASET_I.description: Omega value of this set in i-band (7496 Angstrom)

OMEGASET_Z.name: OMEGASET_Z
OMEGASET_Z.description: Omega value of this set in z-band (10354 Angstrom)

EAMFIT_THETA.name: EAMFIT_THETA
EAMFIT_THETA.description: Final DeltaTHETA (degrees) from extended astrometry module

EAMFIT_THETA0.name: EAMFIT_THETA0
EAMFIT_THETA0.description: Original DeltaTHETA from the EAM (free for all exposures)

EAMFIT_A.name: EAMFIT_A
EAMFIT_A.description: A (flux scaling) from extended astrometry module

EAMFIT_B.name: EAMFIT_B
EAMFIT_B.description: B (flux zeropoint) from extended astrometry module

TAIBEG.name: TAIBEG
TAIBEG.description: TAI at the start of the exposure

HADRILL.name: HADRILL
HADRILL.description: Hour angle plate was drilled for

LSTMID.name: LSTMID
LSTMID.description: Local sidereal time at midpoint of exposure

HAMID.name: HAMID
HAMID.description: Hour angle at midpoint of exposure for this IFU

AIRMASS.name: AIRMASS
AIRMASS.description: Airmass at midpoint of exposure for this IFU

MNGTARG1.name: MNGTARG1
MNGTARG1.description: manga_target1 maskbit for galaxy target catalog

MNGTARG2.name: MNGTARG2
MNGTARG2.description: manga_target2 maskbit for non-galaxy target catalog

MNGTARG3.name: MNGTARG3
MNGTARG3.description: manga_target3 maskbit for ancillary target catalog

BLUESN2.name: BLUESN2
BLUESN2.description: SN2 in blue for this exposure

REDSN2.name: REDSN2
REDSN2.description: SN2 in red for this exposure

BLUETHRUPT.name: BLUETHRUPT
BLUETHRUPT.description: Throughput in blue for this exposure

REDTHRUPT.name: REDTHRUPT
REDTHRUPT.description: Throughput in red for this exposure

BLUEPSTAT.name: BLUEPSTAT
BLUEPSTAT.description: Poisson statistic in blue for this exposure

REDPSTAT.name: REDPSTAT
REDPSTAT.description: Poisson statistic in red for this exposure

THISBADIFU.name: THISBADIFU
THISBADIFU.description: 0 if good, 1 if this IFU was bad in this frame

PF_FWHM_G.name: PF_FWHM_G
PF_FWHM_G.description: FWHM (arcsec) of a single-gaussian fit to the point source response function Prior to Fiber convolution in g band

PF_FWHM_R.name: PF_FWHM_R
PF_FWHM_R.description: FWHM (arcsec) of a single-gaussian fit to the point source response function Prior to Fiber convolution in r band

PF_FWHM_I.name: PF_FWHM_I
PF_FWHM_I.description: FWHM (arcsec) of a single-gaussian fit to the point source response function Prior to Fiber convolution in i band

PF_FWHM_Z.name: PF_FWHM_Z
PF_FWHM_Z.description: FWHM (arcsec) of a single-gaussian fit to the point source response function Prior to Fiber convolution in z band

hdu12.name: XPOS
hdu12.description: Array of fiber X-positions (units of arcsec) relative to the IFU center [NWAVE x (NFIBER*NEXP)]

header.comment: Number of bits per data pixel

hdu13.name: YPOS
hdu13.description: Array of fiber Y-positions (units of arcsec) relative to the IFU center [NWAVE x (NFIBER*NEXP)]

header.comment: Number of bits per data pixel
